TextElement.Str: Modo Debug - escribe un log para debug -
Modo Simulador - simula el movimiento de archivos -

Action.label: Check if any Media has been selected
Alert no media has been selected
Action.Str: Seleccionar almenos un tipo de archivo

Action.label: [alert] Images selected
Action.Str: Las imágenes se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Videos selected
Action.Str: Los videos se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Gifs selected
Action.Str: Los gifs se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Voice Notes selected
Action.Str: Los mensajes de voz se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Docs selected
Action.Str: Los documentos se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Audios selected
Action.Str: Los audios se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: [alert] Data Bases selected
Action.Str: Los respaldos de la base de datos se moverán a la tarjeta SD

Action.label: Scan %Path contents and store them in %Paths
proceed if SDroot was not found yet
test %Paths folder and return result in %SDPathFound
[disabled] if SD path was not found yet, try /fstab
proceed if SDroot was not found yet
get external storage dir with java
[log] write log with SD found path
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) GetPath2SD: [GRE] microSD Path found=%SDPathFound logsDir=%logsDir logsDir_exists=%logsDir_exists

Action.label: [log] test if log dir exists on SD and store result in %logsDir_exists
[log] write log with path not found
Check if SD path was found
Build %Media list of all files in %Folder%Sent folder
[dbg] alert with number of files found
Get %Media modification date and store it in %Media_date
Copy %Media to %destFolder, if not in simulation mode and %Media_age higher than %minAge
Check %destFolder%MediaName(end) if media has been copied to destination folder
Check if file has been transferred
Get %Media size and store it in %MediaSize
Get size of %Media and store it in %MediaSize_onSD
Delete file from internal memory, if not in simulation mode
[dbg] write %LOG with file moved to destination
Increase by 1 number of files moved
[msg] searching SD path...
Action.Str: La aplicación está buscando la ruta a la tarjeta SD donde mover los archivos seleccionados recibidos y enviados por WhatsApp...

Action.label: size on SD is not equal to size on internal memory
Report %Media moved to destination with error
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME: [YEL] %Media movido a SD, pero el tamaño no coincide con el del archivo original. No se elimina de la memoria interna.

Action.label: [dbg] write %LOG with file NOT moved to destination
[msg] Inform number of files moved to SD
Action.Str: Hasta el momento, se movieron a la tarjeta SD %nFiles archivos, liberando un total de %TotalFreedSpace MB

Action.label: [dbg] write stats to %LOG
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME: [MSG] %nFiles archivos WhatsApp movidos. %DATE %TIME: [MSG] %nFolders carpetas Audio WhatsApp movidas. %DATE %TIME: [MSG] %TotalFreedSpace bytes de espacio liberado. %DATE %TIME: [MSG] Fin liberación memoria interna.

Action.label: [msg] report nfiles
Action.Str: Reporte final. Se movieron a la tarjeta SD %nFiles archivos y %nFolders carpetas, liberando de la memoria interna un total de %TotalFreedSpace MB

Action.label: Change Wait label in scene "Esperar..." to "Tarea Finalizada!"
[dbg] show %SDroot folder found
Action.Str:
Ruta a memoria externa encontrada:
%SDroot
Por favor esperar...

Action.label: consulta variable si no se encontró la SD
Ask for SD path if it was not found
Action.Str: Ingresar ruta de micro SD sin barra final:

Action.label: init. selected media
Action.Str: Se ha elegido mover a la tarjeta SD los

Action.label: [msg] no path to SD
Action.Str: Se detiene la tarea porque no se encontró una ruta valida para la tarjeta SD.

Action.label: [msg] inform destination folder on SD
Action.Str: Los archivos WhatsApp seleccionados se moverán a: %path2SD

Action.label: Get %LOG current time and store it in %Now
Check if it's the special folder
List all Voice Notes subfolders in subDir var
Check if at least one subfolder was found
Create destination folder if it not exists
Copy %subDir/ to %path2SD%VoiceNotes/ (destination folder), if not in simulation mode and if %subDir_age is higher than %minAge
check if %path2SD%VoiceNotes/%YYYYxx(end) exists and store it in %YYYYxx_exists_on_dest
Check if folder has been copied
Get %subDir size and store it in %MediaSize
Get size of %path2SD%VoiceNotes/%YYYYxx(end) and store it in %MediaSize_onSD

Delete source folder if it has been copied, if not in simulation mode
ALERT: include single file check before deleting!!!
size on SD is not equal to size on internal memory
Report subdir moved to destination with error
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME: [YEL] %YYYYxx(<) movida a SD, pero el tamaño no coincide con la carpeta original. No se elimina de la memoria interna.

Action.label: If not exists in dest folder
Report subdir NOT moved to destination
[msg] Voice Notes processed so far
Action.Str: Hasta el momento, se movieron a la tarjeta SD: %nFolders carpetas de mensajes de voz

Action.label: Check if %Folder%Sent exists and store result in %Sent_exists
Set %MediaType=%Folder (a new variable to be split)
Split %MediaType (source folder path) with "/" as separator
Check if this is DB folder
Create destination folder if it not exists
if %path2SD has not been set yet
[log] append checked folder to %testDirLog
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [MSG] verificando si existe el directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir

Action.label: check %testWAfolder type and store it to %testWA_exists
check %testWAfolder/%WADir type and store it to %WA_exists_on_SD
[log] WA folder already exists
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [GRE] directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir ya existe en tarjeta SD

Action.label: if %WA_exists_on_SD is not dir, try to create %testWAfolder/%WADir
check %testWAfolder/%WADir type and store it to %WA_exists_on_SD
[log] write %testDirLog with WA folder created message
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [GRE] directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir creado en tarjeta SD

Action.label: if ok file is found, set %path2SD=%testWAfolder
[log] append found folder to %testDirLog
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [GRE] Se encuentra directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir en tarjeta SD con derecho de escritura

Action.label: [log] no write permission on %testWAfolder/%WADir
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [RED] Se encuentra directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir en tarjeta SD, pero sin derecho de escritura

Action.label: [log] write %testDirLog with WA folder found message
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [RED] directorio %testWAfolder/%WADir no encontrado en tarjeta SD y no se pudo crear.

Action.label: [log] write trying %par1
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS) TestSDroot: [MSG] probando directorio %par1 candidato a raíz de SD

Action.label: if %TaskEnded==0, user has pressed the abort button. Go back to GUI
[log] write dir NOT found
Action.Str: %DATE %TIME (%TIMEMS): SimplePath2SD NO se encuentra el directorio %PossibleDestFolder

Action.label: check %PossibleDestFolder type and store it to %DestFolder_exists_on_SD
[alert] Age selected
Action.Str: Los archivos de hace más de %new_val días se moverán a la tarjeta SD. Los otros se mantendrán en la memoria interna.
